title: Practice Pal
description: Coming soon! My final capstone project at NSS, a practice logger for musicians with a built in metronome and recorder that automatically increases tempo as you progress.

title: Pocket Piggy
description: A mobile app that lets parents and kids manage money together. Parents can add funds to kids accounts and add chores and kids can make wishlists accept chores and ask permission to buy the things with the money in their account.

title: Le Baguette
description: A managment dashboard for a fictional 5-star Michelin restuarant. Manage menu, ingredients, employees and seating.

title: Jurassic World
description: A managment dashboard for a fictional dinosaur theme park. Manage staff, repair rides and equipment, add new dinos, but watch out for the Chaos Monkey! He likes to randomly break things.

title: Sports Roster
description: A fun manager for your fantasy baseball team that displays your roster as animated classic baseball cards.
